doc.field: This collection consists of materials documenting the functions and activities of the C.C. Gately Company, a Brooklyn contracting firm operated by Joseph T. Gately in the late 19th century. Materials include ledgers, cash books, and other financial records, including receipts and cancelled checks.

This collection consists of materials documenting the functions and activities of the C.C. Gately Company, a Brooklyn contracting firm operated by Joseph T. Gately in the late 19th century. Materials include ledgers, cash books, and other financial records, including receipts and cancelled checks.

This collection consists of materials documenting the functions and activities of the C.C. Gately Company, a Brooklyn contracting firm operating in the late 19th century. Materials include ledgers, cash books, and other financial records, including receipts and cancelled checks.
The C.C. Gately Company (1856-1905) was a contracting firm operated by Joseph T. Gately in Brooklyn, New York.
Donated by Dermot Gately in March of 2000. The accession number associated with this gift is 1997.030.
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
